category.label: Top Rated
category.description: This feed contains the most highly rated YouTube videos.

category.label: Top Favorites
category.description: This feed contains videos most frequently flagged as favorite videos.

category.label: Most Viewed
category.description: This feed contains the most frequently watched YouTube videos.

category.label: Most Shared
category.description: This feed lists the YouTube videos most frequently shared on Facebook and Twitter. This feed is available as an experimental feature.

category.label: Most Popular
category.description: This feed contains the most popular YouTube videos, selected using an algorithm that combines many different signals to determine overall popularity.

category.label: Most Recent
category.description: This feed contains the videos most recently submitted to YouTube.

category.label: Most Discussed
category.description: This feed contains the YouTube videos that have received the most comments.

category.label: Most Responded
category.description: This feed contains YouTube videos that receive the most video responses.

category.label: Recently Featured
category.description: This feed contains videos recently featured on the YouTube home page or featured videos tab.

category.label: Trending Videos
category.description: This feed lists trending videos as seen on YouTube Trends, which surfaces popular videos as their popularity is increasing and also analyzes broader trends developing within the YouTube community. This feed is available as an experimental feature.

category.label: All Categories
category.description: This will change the standard feed categories to view all categories.
